title: AVS STORE Indian Pure Hammered Copper Jug with 2 Tumbler Glass Set for Ayurvedic Healing
features: Handmade Copper water pitcher and Glass is produced by skilled Indian craftsmen
Jug Measures 1750 Ml of water; Jug measures 7.5" in height by 4.5" in diameter
Water Glass Measures 3.6" in height by 2.8" in diameter and 250 mL in capacity
Ayurvedic Pitcher Store water inside over night to reap the health benefits of copper
description: The pitcher has a hammered finish that reflects the light beautifully, and its base and handle are constructed out of high quality bronze with a stunning gold tone. Large enough to hold 1750 Ml of water, the pitcher is 7.5 inches tall by 4.5 inches in diameter. 2 copper water glasses having capacity 250 ml each, 3.6 inch in height and 2.8 inches in diameter are included with pitcher. The pitcher can pour roughly seven standard 8-ounce servings of water, so it's perfect for entertaining. Experience the health benefits of a copper water pitcher made the traditional way - by hand from start to finish! Impress your guests with a beautiful metal water pitcher that makes pouring a simple glass of water a stylish task.
